result.arabic_text: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
result.translation: 43. Tokkel kaa qaffosneeh, barráa kee xaylooy wonnah tanim keenilluk ossantinah kaah necee, woh inkih Nek yan racmatay kaah abne, kaadu usuk abe sabri qaafiyatah yan kas-le marah kassit yakkem keh.
